item.title: Clip of Stone Pelting on Ganesh Idol in Karnataka Viral With False Communal Spin
item.description:
<![CDATA[A video showing two people standing on the roof of a building, pelting stones at a Ganesh immersion procession passing by, is being widely shared on social media.
The claim: A section of social media users have claimed that it shows people from the Muslim community pelting stones at the Hindu festival procession in Hassan, Karnataka....]]>
item.author: Aishwarya Varma

item.title: Viral Post Claiming To Show Muslims Throwing Stones During Ganesh Visarjan In Raichur Is False
item.description:
<![CDATA[A video circulating on social media claims that Muslims hurled stones from rooftops during a procession for Ganesh Visarjan in Raichur, Karnataka. The 45-second clip shows a Ganpati procession moving down a street when two young men standing on a rooftop start throwing stones at the crowd.
Screengrab from X post by @GudumbaSatti
Also Read: Viral Video Showing Burkina Faso President Announcing Trade Deal With India Is A Deepfake
Evidence
In the viral 45-second clip, two young men are seen p...]]>
